WorkflowInfo.Name: Monitor file access date
WorkflowInfo.Description: Monitors file access date and send alert in case it was accessed in the last 60 minutes
WorkflowInfo.XML:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:FileAccessedDate;Assembly=FileAccessedDate, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:DateDifference;Assembly=DateDifference, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><ns0:FileAccessedDate IsValid="True" x:Name="fileAccessedDate1" HostName="localhost" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="File Accessed Date" Path="c:\users.xls" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets the file last accessed date." HostId="1" TypeName="FileAccessedDate" UserName="" /><ns1:DateDifference IsNowSelected="1" x:Name="dateDifference1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" IsValid="True" FirstDate="" SecondDateFormat="MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss" DisplayName="Date Difference" Description="Returns the date difference between two dates." ReturnFormat="Minutes" FirstDateFormat="" TypeName="DateDifference" SecondDate="%fileAccessedDate1%" /><IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity1"><IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity1"><ns2:ReturnValue Value="60" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="<" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=&&& < 60" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /><ns3:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="The file c:\TopSecret.xls was accessed in the last 60 minutes" DestinationNumber="1" x:Name="sendEmail1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="0" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, group or duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=utf-8" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 10.00.9200.16618"></HEAD>
<BODY style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: white">The file c:\TopSecret.xls was accessed 
%dateDifference1% minutes ago.</BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /></IfElseBranchActivity><IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity2"><ns2:ReturnValue Value="Default Branch" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="{x:Null}" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="0" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /></IfElseBranchActivity></IfElseActivity></SequentialWorkflowActivity>
